wikipedia_page.main: John Abbott (25 May 1943 – December 2002) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Crewe Alexandra as a centre-half.

response: * Jack Abbott (author) (1944–2002), American criminal and author
* Jack Abbott (The Young and the Restless), a character in a CBS soap opera
* Jack Abbott (coach) (1873–1918), American college football and baseball coach
